ygData.subject: Best way of filtering of URLs with RegExp?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I like to filter specific URLs and everything works really fine with RegExp in fetch-processor - midfetch-decide-rules . But I noticed in the logs that

Hi,

I like to filter specific URLs and everything works really fine with R=
egExp in "fetch-processor -> midfetch-decide-rules". But I noticed in the l=
ogs that heritrix gets the http-header of every "unwanted" page.

Is there =
a possibility to prevent crawling "unwanted" pages in advance, so that heri=
trix does not get any piece of the file? I tried the "pre-fetch-processors"=
 but it didn't work with the same RegExp.

Thanks!
